issue.title: Qt Splash Screen is deleted (and accesses wallet) after Shutdown() (and wallets are deleted).
issue.body: In trying to debug #12337 I added a sleep at the end of AppInitMain() to simulate being able to close the application late in the AppInitMain() process. If I close the splash screen at this point, I get a reliable crash when the splashs screen is deleted as it tries to disconnect itself from the wallet ShowProgress signal after Shutdown() has been called and the wallet has been deleted.
